descriptions.contract: This is contract allows you to create a unique ID and tie it to your Ethereum account. The ID is computed from identifying information on your social security account website. It may therefore reveal private information about you.
descriptions.createID: This function starts an interactive oracle session in which the user logs into their social security account page, such that the enclave can generate a proof of their ID.
descriptions.getAccount: A simple function which returns the Ethereum account belonging to a given ID, if it exists.
descriptions.getID: A simple function which returns the ID for a given account, if the account already created their ID.
